thread.title: 10Best Readers' Choice: Vote for the best destinations in the US!
thread.title_full: 10Best Readers' Choice: Vote for the best destinations in the US!

author: 10Best Editors, USA TODAY 10Best
title: 10Best Readers' Choice: Vote for the best destinations in the US!
text:
Vote for your favorite destinations in the USA now through Sept. 14 at noon ET. (Photo: Wavebreakmedia Ltd, Getty Images/Wavebreak Media)
2 CONNECT 6 TWEET LINKEDIN COMMENT EMAIL MORE Does your ideal vacation involve retail therapy or relaxation at a sumptuous resort spa? Or are you more of an outdoorsy traveler with an itinerary filled with hikes and bike rides? Maybe you're all about the culture of a place ... the museums, galleries and performing arts. No matter what type of traveler you are, we need your help in picking the best travel destinations in the USA in the 10Best Readers' Choice awards. From now until Monday, September 14 at noon ET, you can vote once per day in the categories of Best Destination for Shopaholics , Best Destination for History Buffs , Best Destination for Culturephiles , Best Destination for Outdoor Enthusiasts and Best Destination for Luxury Travelers .
Click on each category below to vote, or visit 10Best.com . The nominees in each category are as follows:

New Orleans is one of 20 nominees for Best Destination for Culturephiles. (Photo: Richard Nowitz)
